fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Connection: You are randomly assigned a non-King, non-Cultist target at the beginning of the game.
- Soul Link: You die with your target, unless that target dies before Round 3.
- Reconnect: If your target dies before Round 3, you may select a new target that cannot be the King or a player whose role is publicly revealed.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Holy Protection: Discard 3 cards. Guard! an attack on your target. [Infinite uses, 2 CD]
- Healing Tears: Heal! your target. [3 uses, 1 CD, Post-Mortem]
- Sacrifice: You will die at the end of this round. Your target is healed 5 HP. [1 use, Unique, LOR6]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Your target must survive to see the end of the game, or win within 2 phases of their death.
